text.entityculling.blockEntityFrustumCul: When turned on, block entity state extraction will be culled based on the camera's view frustum. This can improve performance in case your modloader/another mod doesn't do this already.
text.entityculling.forceDisplayCulling.t: When turned on, display entities without a bounding box will get assigned a default bounding box for culling purposes. This can improve performance for maps/servers that do not configure their display entities correctly, but can cause visual issues.
